summary: Replacer for the Armour and Weapons
descriptionHtml:
Ironman5000 Retextures - Fiendish Falmer Armour and Weapons
=============================================================

Description:

This mod is a retexture of the Falmer armour and weapons .  The theme of this mod is to give the equipment a more daedric aesthetic which I plan to use in upcoming project based around this concept.
At the moment this mod is a replacer version but once the construction set/kit is available I will make these items unique.

Installation:

Extract the folder into the Skyrim data folder, default folder directory should be C:\\Program Files(x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data.  If you have a mod that already retextures
the Falmer equipment then you will be prompted to overwrite files, say yes to all for this mod to take effect.

Uninstallation:

Delete these;
data\\textures\\armor and remove the falmerarmor folder
data\\textures\\weapons and remove the falmer folder
data\\meshes\\armor and remove the falmer folder
data\\meshes\\weapons and remove the falmer folder.  All gone!

If you have more mods active it might be a good idea to check these folders before deleting them in case there are additional files such as custom skeleton nif or normal map dds files, for example.

Tools used:

BSAopt, the ideal Skyrim BSA extraction program
Gimp 2.0, a really useful and free image editing program
Nifskope 1.1.0-RC5 - Latest version compatible with Skyrim meshes
author: Ironman5000
